relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: ID3 Metadata for MP3, Version 1
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">sound</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Structured data chunk containing descriptive metadata about the file to which it is post-pended, virtually always an MP3_FF (MP3 sound file). Referred to by its creators as an "informal standard," ID3v1 permits the identification of title, artist, date, genre, etc.
